trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bolivar
There was one other sighting in Bolivar on or around November 22nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy boyfriend called me and my son,*(name deleted--cms\sg) outside and these starlike objects were shooting across the sky at different heights and different brightnesses, and im a very skeptical person and ive never seen anything like it ! there was probably about 75-100 of them.and we were freaking out. we tried videoing it but it was too dark and it just didnt come out good. i was trying to get the camera to work but we were in so much shock that we couldnt.
Summary: about 75-100 things flying across the sky going in a westward direction
